item.title: Port Scanning
item.description: Initial Scans Quick Port Scan (Fast finds open ports) masscan -e tun0 -p 1-65535 --rate 2000 $ip Vulnerability scan (Run all vulnerability scripts ) nmap -script=vuln $ip nmap UDP scan nmap $ip -p- -sU -oA AutoRecon ~/AutoRecon/autorecon.py --single-target --only-scans-dir $ip Export TCP Ports to markdown /opt/nmap2md/nmap2md.py results/scans/xml/_full_tcp_nmap.xml > ports.txt; mousepad ports.txt Export UDP Ports to markdown /opt/nmap2md/nmap2md.py results/scans/xml/_top_20_udp_nmap.xml > ports.txt; mousepad ports.txt NMAP Host Discovery - Scan Network Range
